h3cPUMan.name: h3cPUMan
h3cPUMan.contactinfo: Surveillance Network Management Team H3C Technologies Co.,Ltd. East-Com Information Industry Base, Bing-Jiang District Hangzhou P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
h3cPUMan.description: The PU includes those device like EC(Encoder), DC(Decoder) and ECR(Encoder Recorder). The PU will survey the remote video and audio. This MIB is defined to manage the PU as our private MIB node according to its specific capability.

h3cPUisOnline.name: h3cPUisOnline
h3cPUisOnline.description: The PU online status indicates whether the PU is normally registered into the VM. True indicates that the PU is normally registered into the VM.

h3cPUCMSAddr.name: h3cPUCMSAddr
h3cPUCMSAddr.description: The IP address of the CMS. All zero address indicates the CMS address is not configured.

h3cPUVersionServerAddr.name: h3cPUVersionServerAddr
h3cPUVersionServerAddr.description: The IP address of the version server. All zero address indicates the version server is not configured or does not support remote upgrade.

h3cPUExternalInputAlarmChannelID.name: h3cPUExternalInputAlarmChannelID
h3cPUExternalInputAlarmChannelID.description: The ID of the external input alarm channel.

h3cPUExternalInputAlarmStatus.name: h3cPUExternalInputAlarmStatus
h3cPUExternalInputAlarmStatus.description: True indicates that the current channel has alarm.

h3cPUExternalOutputAlarmChannelID.name: h3cPUExternalOutputAlarmChannelID
h3cPUExternalOutputAlarmChannelID.description: The ID of the external output alarm channel

h3cPUExternalOutputAlarmStatus.name: h3cPUExternalOutputAlarmStatus
h3cPUExternalOutputAlarmStatus.description: True indicates that the current channel has alarm.

h3cPUECCameraOnlines.name: h3cPUECCameraOnlines
h3cPUECCameraOnlines.description: Number of online cameras connected to an EC.

h3cPUECCameraAvailRate.name: h3cPUECCameraAvailRate
h3cPUECCameraAvailRate.description: Camera available rate. That is, the ratio of available cameras to total cameras connected to an EC. It ranges from 0 to 100.

h3cPUECVideoChannelID.name: h3cPUECVideoChannelID
h3cPUECVideoChannelID.description: The ID of the video channel

h3cPUECVideoChannelName.name: h3cPUECVideoChannelName
h3cPUECVideoChannelName.description: The name of the video channel. It is suggested that the name includes the channel ID information.

h3cPUECVideoChannelServiceStatus.name: h3cPUECVideoChannelServiceStatus
h3cPUECVideoChannelServiceStatus.description: The service status of the video channel. 0 the status is not known. 1 the video is not used or the channel has no signal. 2 the camera is kinescoping. 3 the camera is take snapshot.

h3cPUDCRcvVideoPackets.name: h3cPUDCRcvVideoPackets
h3cPUDCRcvVideoPackets.description: The total number of video packets which are received from interfaces.

h3cPUDCRcvVideoRefFrames.name: h3cPUDCRcvVideoRefFrames
h3cPUDCRcvVideoRefFrames.description: The total number of video reference frames which are received from interfaces.

h3cPUDCVideoPacketsLoss.name: h3cPUDCVideoPacketsLoss
h3cPUDCVideoPacketsLoss.description: The total number of lost video packets.

h3cPUDCVideoRefFramesLoss.name: h3cPUDCVideoRefFramesLoss
h3cPUDCVideoRefFramesLoss.description: The total number of lost video reference frames.

h3cPUECManExternalSemaphoreTrap.name: h3cPUECManExternalSemaphoreTrap
h3cPUECManExternalSemaphoreTrap.description: Send a trap about external semaphore alarm.

h3cPUECManVideoLossTrap.name: h3cPUECManVideoLossTrap
h3cPUECManVideoLossTrap.description: Send a trap about video loss. Video loss is that no video signal is inputted to the EC.

h3cPUECManVideoRecoverTrap.name: h3cPUECManVideoRecoverTrap
h3cPUECManVideoRecoverTrap.description: Send a trap about video recovery after loss.

h3cPUECManMotionDetectTrap.name: h3cPUECManMotionDetectTrap
h3cPUECManMotionDetectTrap.description: Send a trap about motion detection.

h3cPUECManOnLineFailureTrap.name: h3cPUECManOnLineFailureTrap
h3cPUECManOnLineFailureTrap.description: Send a trap when EC can not register the CMS.

h3cPUECManConnectionCMSFailureTrap.name: h3cPUECManConnectionCMSFailureTrap
h3cPUECManConnectionCMSFailureTrap.description: Send a trap when the connection with the CMS breaks down.

h3cPUECManConnectionVerSrvFailureTrap.name: h3cPUECManConnectionVerSrvFailureTrap
h3cPUECManConnectionVerSrvFailureTrap.description: Send a trap when the connection with the version server breaks down or can not create.

h3cPUECManFlashFailureTrap.name: h3cPUECManFlashFailureTrap
h3cPUECManFlashFailureTrap.description: Send a trap about flash failure.

h3cPUECManCameraShelterTrap.name: h3cPUECManCameraShelterTrap
h3cPUECManCameraShelterTrap.description: Send a trap when a camera is sheltered.

h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX1.name: h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX1
h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX1.description: The horizontal coordinate of top left point of the motion detection region.

h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY1.name: h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY1
h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY1.description: The vertical coordinate of top left point of the motion detection region.

h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX2.name: h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX2
h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX2.description: The horizontal coordinate of botton right point of the motion detection region.

h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY2.name: h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY2
h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY2.description: The horizontal coordinate of botton right point of the motion detection region.
